import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { singleTV } from '../actions' import '../css/NavBar.css' const TVseries = (props) => { const tvID = props.match.params.id console.log(tvID) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(singleTV(tvID)) }, []) const getTVseries = useSelector((state) => state.singleTV) return(

{getTVseries?.title}

{getTVseries?.release_date}

{getTVseries?.genres.map((gen) => { return( {gen.name}, ) })}
{getTVseries?.vote_average}
Üye
Puanları

Özet

{getTVseries?.overview}

Chris Columbus

Director

Chris Columbus

Director

Chris Columbus

Director

) } export default TVseries;
